product.shortDescription: Semi-processed fruit-flavoured preparation for soft drinks, GLUTEN FREE
product.fullDescription: Relaxing with friends or with a partner, preferably at home, the latest trend is to enjoy a do-it-yourself aperitif. And now with Fabbri Mixyfruit you can put together a top class cocktail without the special ingredients used by the professionals. With its high juice and pulp content, Mixyfruit Coconut is the ideal ingredient for cool exotic drinks. The 500 ml size makes up to 20-25 cocktails. All you have to choose is the company!
product.name: MIXYFRUIT COCONUT PET 1000ML
product.extraDetail: Product of Italy. Best before the date marked below.

specifications.myValue: for direct cocktail preparation 1 part of pure product for 6/8 parts of liquid.

glucose syrup, coconut pulp (3O%), sugar, water, maltodextrins, emulsifier E 473 (sucrose esters of fatty acids), MILK proteins, stabilizer E 406 (agar), salt, flavourings, preservative E 202 (potassium sorbate) Shake well before use.

blog.title: Strawberry Fusion
blog.shortDescription: Extremely refreshing drink with a burst of flavour
blog.preparation: Shake all the ingredients and pour them in a glass filled with ice. Garnish and serve.
